name: Javix
description: A modern, feature-rich WhatsApp bot with advanced features, role management, and AI integration

SESSION_ID.description: Session ID for your bot. You can put any secure characters/crypto.

OWNER_NUMBERS.description: Whatsapp account number of the owner. Multiple numbers must be separated by a comma.

PREFIX.description: Your desired prefix to use bot.

BOT_IMAGES.description: Images for your bot. Multiple images must be seprated by comma.
